meta.job_title: Corporate and Commercial Transactions Associate Attorney

duties_responsibilities.duty: Draft and review contracts and other legal documents, including mergers and acquisitions, forming entities, real estate, and general transactional work.
Assist with the negotiation of transactions between clients.
Review contracts and risks and advise clients with legal recommendations and strategies.
Meet with clients and advise them on regulations and compliance laws.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor and NYS Bar Admittance is required. 3+ years of experience practicing commercial transaction law is required.
